text: The Citizens' Political Movement (Movimento Politico dei Cittadini, MPC) was a left-wing populist political party in Italy founded by Senator Fernando Rossi, former member of the Party of Italian Communists and of United Consumers, on 27 September 2007.http://www.radioradicale.it/scheda/236031 The party formed an alliance, named For the Common Good for the 2008 general election, along with the Federation of Liberal Democrats, the Humanist Party and Green Front, and gained 0.3% of the vote, despite being present only in some constituencies. ==References== ==External links== * Category:2007 establishments in Italy Category:Defunct political parties in Italy Category:Political parties established in 2007 Category:Political parties with year of disestablishment missing Category:Italian political party stubs
title: Citizens' Political Movement
